thread.title: Museums and National Monuments Board named in Seychelles
thread.title_full: Museums and National Monuments Board named in Seychelles

author: eTN Editor
title: Museums and National Monuments Board named in Seychelles
text:
Museums and National Monuments Board named in Seychelles Adv: Museum Advisory Board, (Bottom) - National Monuments Board Adv: 
There is a need for the people of Seychelles to recognize the vitality of the museums and monuments and to understand that they are there for the country. 
The Minister for Tourism and Culture, Alain St.Ange, said this while meeting the members of two newly-appointed advisory boards - the National Monuments Board and the Museums Board. 
Attending the two back-to-back meetings held at the Ministry of Tourism & Culture Offices at ESPACE building was the Principal Secretary for Culture, Benjamine Rose. 
Minister St.Ange said it is vital to break away from the perception of seeing the museums and monuments being solely for the Ministry of Tourism and Culture. 
The Museums Advisory Board chaired by Marcel Rosalie is made up as follows: 
Marcel Rosalie (Chairperson)
